A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Shallow plot and way to many banal statements that sound good on the surface but have no consistency with the rest of the movie. Example: \" The war is just beginning.\" Um no\, it is not\, you have been fighting the first order (lets be honest\, a cliche empire created so shallow fans can root for the underdog resistance\, because rooting for the underdog makes everyone feel good.) for 2 movies now. The writers put no thought into this script or how it relates to the Force Awakens\, but I don't blame them because the Force Awakens set the originality bar VERY low.
